Original:
地點在通化夜市附近算是不難找
但離捷運有一小段距離

店內環境蠻簡約的
有吧檯座位跟桌位
如果人數比較多的話
簾子拉起來會有點像是一個包廂的感覺
但因為是拉簾
所以如果包廂內氣氛比較嗨
整體環境會有點偏吵

但調酒部分蠻不錯
感覺以水果為主題去做不同的搭配跟調整
可惜有幾款朋友想嘗試的都剛好缺貨售完
不過點了幾杯都覺得蠻好喝的
整體走清爽感 酒感的話也大多是偏妹酒
食物部分因為吃飽了才去所以只點了松露薯條
但生蠔的部分蠻吸引人的
有機會會想再去嘗試看看食物👍🏻

低消部分一個人要800元
店內的調酒價格都是400元
等於不吃東西的話一個人至少要點2杯酒
但因為整體調酒種類也不多
感覺是比較適合聚餐小酌的店家

The overall feeling of refreshing wine is mostly partial girl wine
The food part has only ordered the truffle fries because I was full
But the oyster part is quite attractive
I have a chance to try to see the food again 👍🏻

Some people are 800 yuan in low consumption.
The bartending price in the store is 400 yuan
If you don't eat, one person must have at least 2 glasses of wine
But because there are not many types of bartending
It feels like a shop that is more suitable for dinner drinks

店門很隱密要不是朋友帶路我應該會直接錯過
因為很昏暗所以氣氛很好的酒吧（？）
蠻多調酒都是水果風味，雖然濃度沒有很高但喝起來還蠻有層次的🍸點了幾杯都有噴火的環節，不只好看也讓調酒的香氣更豐富

It is very suitable for the bar at the three or five friends gatherings!

Original: 應該是基隆路上最喜歡的酒吧之一！店內工業風設計，氣氛跟播的音樂也都很好，坐在環狀吧台可以看到中間bartender調酒。每杯調酒是以兩個食材為主軸，都比較屬於清爽有層次類型的調酒！
EN: It should be one of the favorite bars on Keelung Road!The industrial style design in the store, the atmosphere and the broadcast of the music are also very good. Sitting in the ring bar can see Bartnder bartender in the middle.Each cup of bartending is based on two ingredients, which is more refreshing and layered bartender!

Original: 有質感，將每杯調酒化成我們生活中都能碰觸到的味覺食材，挺有趣，喝了三杯，給予的層次跟口感都很好，雖然會有比如像花生醬，這麼強烈跟突出的味道，但整個搭起來卻異常的和諧，不會像喝了一杯怪怪的酒，當你會期待下一杯調酒會帶給你什麼樣的視覺，味覺享受，這間店就非常值得你一來再來，是間用心的吧!
EN: With texture, each cup of alcohol is turned into the taste ingredients that we can touch in our lives. It is very interesting. After drinking three cups, the levels and taste given by them are very good. It tastes, but the whole is extremely harmonious, and it will not look like drinking a strange wine. When you look forward to what kind of vision will you bring to you in the next cup of bartender, you will enjoy it. Come again, it's attentive!

Original:
氛圍一級棒的酒吧。

新開的酒吧，有幸在週末能夠訂到位子體驗一下。從門外的設計，到進門整體的服務感覺都非常好。我有注意到幾乎所有的店員都是年輕人，感覺是一群熱血深愛調酒的好夥伴，一起開的夢想之店。

裝潢走極簡風，有點像日式清水模的感覺。淺灰色的牆壁配上深色的傢俱，非常漂亮的搭配；再加上少部分的綠植點綴，很舒服自然的氛圍。桌子上木紋裝飾的小燈還可以調亮度，很好玩。

新開的酒吧，當然值得鼓勵。誠心話來說，其實調酒還需有待稍微加強。Sandalwood酒單上的特色調酒，反而特色不強。水果類的甘蔗，葡萄，番茄；香料類的斑斕葉，鼠尾草，羅勒；這6種店家主打的特色調酒，都顯得有點單調，酒體也不夠強烈。雖然喝起來很舒爽，但就覺得少了那麼點特色，視覺裝飾呈現上也都可以再加強一點。如果在這6種裡面要挑的話，我覺得甘蔗是最有特色的，也是最推薦的。

反倒是classic的經典調酒都做得很好，表示bartender的基本功夫很不錯。希望在營運的過程之中還能不斷調整，我相信以店家的底子應該會有更好的表現。

地點很好，交通方便，在深夜的時候還可以在通化夜市吃點宵夜。值得推薦的好店家，以後還會再來。
EN:
The atmosphere is a great bar.

The newly opened bar is fortunate to be able to order the seat on the weekend to experience it.From the design outside the door, to the overall service of entering the door, it feels very good.I noticed that almost all the clerks were young people. They felt like a group of good partners who loved bartender and opened their dreams together.

The decoration takes a minimalist style, a bit like a Japanese -style clean water model.The light -gray wall with dark furniture is very beautiful; coupled with a small number of green plants embellishment, a very comfortable and natural atmosphere.The small lights decorated with wood grain on the table can also adjust the brightness, which is fun.

The newly opened bar is of course worthy of encouragement.Sincerely, in fact, bartending needs to be slightly strengthened.The specialty bartending on the Sandalwood wine list is not strong.Fruits of sugarcane, grapes, tomatoes; spices, colorful leaves, sage, and Lales; these 6 shops are specially monotonous, and the body is not strong enough.Although it is very refreshing, I feel that it is less characteristic, and the visual decoration can be strengthened a little.If you want to pick in these 6 kinds, I think sugarcane is the most distinctive and recommended.

On the contrary, Classic's classic bartending is done well, indicating that Bartender's basic kung fu is very good.I hope that in the process of operation, I can continue to adjust. I believe that the foundation of the store should have a better performance.

The location is very good and the traffic is convenient. You can also eat supper at the Tonghua Night Market late at night.It is worth recommending good shops, and I will come again in the future.

Original:
調酒：🌕🌕🌕🌕🌗

Original:
我們在菜單上點了三杯雞尾酒。它們都是甜甜的、果香濃鬱的。太甜了，不適合我的口味。但這不是我不喜歡這些飲料的原因。令我困擾的是飲料的水份濃度。請注意，我點了菜單上最烈的雞尾酒。
唯一的優點是裝飾，但台北有很多不錯的酒吧可供享受。
EN:
We ordered three cups of cocktails on the menu.They are all sweet and rich.It's too sweet, not for my taste.But this is not the reason I don't like these drinks.What troubles me is the water concentration of the drink.Please note that I ordered the intense cocktail on the menu.
The only advantage is decoration, but there are many good bars in Taipei to enjoy.

Original: 食物不是很好，沙爹炸雞很濕。飲料的成分很有趣，但相當簡單。
EN: The food is not very good, and the sand daddy fried chicken is very wet.The ingredients of the beverage are very interesting, but it is quite simple.

Original:
我個人覺得這裡的酒不太符合個人口味，沒有評論家說的那麼好。  座位之間存在高度差，這意味著一方在與朋友聊天時被迫抬頭。
收取服務費用但未提供服務（點餐、收杯+偶爾加水）
廁所只有一間，想嘔吐的客人建議早點排隊。如果不小心吐在外面，請支付2000元的清潔費！

點了一杯奶酒，送到後，玻璃杯碎了不到1/3（正常使用）
告訴服務生後，酒就被拿走了，沒有任何回應。

退房的時候問為什麼不重新送酒+是否包含在賬單裡，結果被告知因為酒杯已經留在桌子上了，是客人自己的問題，萬一嘴裡怎麼辦？
EN:
I personally think that the wine here is not in line with personal taste, and it is not as good as the critics say.There is a high difference between the seats, which means that one party is forced to look up while chatting with friends.
Get service fees but not provided services (ordering, cups+occasional add water)
There is only one toilet. Guests who want to vomit are advised to queue up early.If you accidentally spit out, please pay a clean fee of 2,000 yuan!

After ordering a glass of milk, after it was delivered, the glass was broken by less than 1/3 (normal use)
After telling the waiter, the wine was taken away without any response.

When checking out, ask why you do n’t send the wine+whether it is included in the bill. As a result, he was told that because the wine glass had left on the table, it was the guest's own problem. What if the mouth is in the mouth?

Original:
台灣有很多不錯的酒吧。對於像 Sandalwood 這樣的新酒吧，請務必調查您想要管理的酒吧類型。對於您的甲板來說，它看起來像一個私密且高端的酒吧。但你和我一樣錯了。由於缺乏地毯等隔音材料，噪音非常大。混凝土牆和帶有木/竹子牆的地板不會減弱說話的聲音，更不用說當一群 4-5 個人在你的座位後面大聲笑和說話時大聲喊叫。當您幾乎聽不到朋友說話時，您的耳後就會不斷出現響亮而粗魯的聲音。我不知道，如果你是我，也許你會想在啤酒吧大喊大叫。但如果你想要一個高品質的酒吧，我不會推薦它。

最後一個人回答我「酒吧就像這樣從任何酒吧消失了」。不是因為我，我沒有力量。這是因為我們的服務不合適。

最後但並非最不重要的一點是，也許您會想到「我曾經是 Bar Code 酒吧經理」或「我在一家著名的酒吧工作」。是的，也許你的調酒技巧很好。台灣有很多酒吧。我不會再去。
EN:
There are many good bars in Taiwan.For new bars like Sandalwood, be sure to investigate the type of bar you want to manage.For your deck, it looks like a private and high -end bar.But you are wrong as me.Due to lack of sound insulation materials such as carpets, the noise is very high.The concrete wall and the floor with wood/bamboo walls will not weaken the sound of speaking, let alone a group of 4-5 people laugh loudly behind your seat and shout loudly.When you hardly hear your friends speak, there will be loud and rude sounds behind your ears.I don't know, if you are me, maybe you will want to yell at the beer bar.But if you want a high -quality bar, I will not recommend it.

The last person answered that "the bar disappeared like this like this."Not because of me, I have no power.This is because our service is inappropriate.

In the end, it is not the most unimportant point. Maybe you think of "I used to be a bar code bar manager" or "I work in a famous bar."Yes, maybe your bartending skills are very good.There are many bars in Taiwan.I won't go again.
